General.Name: Shaanxi Huaqin Technology Industry Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shaanxi Huaqin Technology Industry Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of special functional materials. It offers stealth materials, camouflage materials, and protective materials are used in national defense weapons and equipment, such as aircraft, main battle tanks, ships, missiles, camouflage of important ground military targets, and surface protection of various equipment components. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Xi'an, China.

1.Name: Mr. Tengfei  Wu
1.Title: Board Sec., Deputy Gen. Mang. and Financial Controller
